required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study Evaluating ET-01 in Subjects With Transfusion Dependent β-Thalassaemia
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open Label Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of a Single Dose of Autologous CRISPR-Cas9 Modified CD34+ Human Hematopoietic Stem and Progenitor Cells (hHSPCs) in Subjects With Transfusion Dependent β-Thalassaemia

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-arm, open label, multi-center, single-dose phase 1 study in subjects with transfusion dependent β-thalassaemia. The study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of autologous CRISPR-Cas9 Modified CD34+ Human Hematopoietic Stem and Progenitor Cells (hHSPCs) using ET-01.

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency and severity of collected AEs & SAEs

primary_outcome.time_frame: From signing of informed consent up to 24 months post-ET-01 infusion
From baseline (pre-transfusion) up to 12 months post-ET-01 infusion

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with abnormal proliferation of blood cells

intervention.description: Recruited participants will receive ET-01 IV infusion following myeloablative conditioning with busulfan.

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects and/or legal representative fully understand and voluntarily sign informed consent forms.
- Diagnosis of transfusion dependent β-thalassemia (β-TDT) as defined by protocol.
- Be not appropriate to receive conventional allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation.
- Lansky/Karnofsky score ≥ 70%.
- Eligible for hematopoietic stem cell transplantation and conditioning with busulfan as per investigator's judgement.
Other protocol defined inclusion criteria may apply.
Key Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with associated α-thalassemia.
- Subjects with any clinically significant acute or uncontrolled infections.
- History of uncontrolled epilepsy or other mental disorders.
- Previous treatment with allogeneic bone marrow transplantation or gene therapy.
Other protocol defined exclusion criteria may apply.

facility.name: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University
Guangzhou Women and Children's Medical Center
Institute of Hematology & Blood Diseases Hospital

clinical_study.keyword: Human Hematopoietic Stem and Progenitor Cells
